item.description:
Since I like Seattles Best Coffee at this Book Store,
I will schedule a Meet Up here.

This Borders is at the Connecticut Post Mall
Next to Target.
The Coffee area is at the part of the Book Store facing Rte. 1.

So, even if no one shows up, I can still buy some books, magazines
and enjoy a cup of coffee.

Like all Meet Ups this time of year, it
does depend on the weather.

Those who RSVP Yes,
I will e-mail them where to meet me.

http://events.connpost.com/milford-ct/venues/show/875910-borders

events.connpost.com/milford-ct/venues/show/875910-borders

This Borders and others will be closing in a couple of months

So I want to have one more Meet Up before it closes.

www.wfsb.com/news/26943063/detail.html

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.
item.why: The Milford and 5 other Conn. Borders will be closing within a few months so we are running out of time to enjoy Seattle's Best Coffee at this location.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Has Seattles Best Coffee @ Milford Borders
